signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a form for pickup requests that allows customers to fill out specific information.
signals.customer_ask: Can hiver create a form for pickup requests?
signals.suggested_solution: A form that customers can fill out to create an email request.
signals.context: Team of 6-7 people managing multiple mailboxes.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the safety and privacy of their emails when using the product.
signals.customer_ask: How is the safety of emails managed?
signals.suggested_solution: Clarification on email security and compliance.
signals.context: Team of 6-7 people managing multiple mailboxes.

signals.problem_statement: The customer requires the product interface to support the German language.
signals.customer_ask: Is there an option to switch to German?
signals.suggested_solution: Provide a German interface option for the product.
signals.context: Team of 6-7 people managing multiple mailboxes.
